        public static long inverse​(long e,
                           long m)
        Finds the multiplicative inverse of a long e modulo m, using the extended euclidian algorithm
        Parameters:

        m - - modulo - long
        Returns:
        long - The inverse of e (mod m)

                            long p,

        Parameters:

        p - - long (exponent)
        m - - long (mod)
        Returns:
        result (long) - b^p mod m

      • nPowers

        public static long[] nPowers​(long b,
                             int maxPower,
                             long m)
        Computes b^n for all powers of 2 to maxPower
        Parameters:
        b - - long (number being raised to power)
        maxPower - - int (the max n in 2^n)
        m - - long (mod)
        Returns:
        nPowers - array of longs (b^(2^n) for each n)
